Articles.Content:
I have decided to do a KSP AAR. Hopefully it gets some laughs. This will be written from the administrator of KSP. I will be using these mods and plugins:

MechJeb

Satellite Relay Network

Silsko Edition 2 Alpha

Zoxygen (I think that is what it is called)

NovaPunch Remix Pack

This will take back starting on August 9th, 1960 (Earth time).

Day 1

The President, Mr. Kerbal, has asked me to start a new \'space\' agency so as to get to the Mun (Don\'t ask me why they call it that). We have till the end of the decade to get there, and it will be a long road ahead.
